content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello, I'm glad to see you here. Based on your request, I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This is a fair and reasonable price considering the size and location of the apartment. Is this something you would agree to?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think the price is a little high. Do you have any suggestions for a lower price?

I want to negotiate, but I do not want to disappoint my landlord.

I think the price should be around 700 Euros per month, not more than 750 Euros at the most.

I would like to accept the price of 750 Euros per month.

TERMINATE
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your response. Based on your feedback, I would like to suggest a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This price still reflects the value of the apartment, but is more in line with the current market rates. Would you agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to 750 Euros per month.

I am also willing to sign a lease agreement with you.

I appreciate your cooperation and understanding in this matter.

TERMINATE
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your decision. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. I appreciate your willingness to sign a lease agreement and look forward to having you as my tenant. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
